p: Arsenic hexoxide (AS 4O 6, AS6) used in this study was provided by Chemas Co., LTD (Seoul, South Korea). AS6 was invented by Ill Ju Bae and Zenglin Lian and was manufactured by the company. The chemical properties and purity of AS6 were validated through the analytical chemical methods. AS6 has been patented for treating breast cancer under a United States patent number US 10,525,079 B2 since January 7, 2020. AS6 was provided as a 2.5Â mM stock solution dissolved in water.
